page.title: 17The Village of Trelights
page.content: Trelights is a very small village,it is all countryside and has very narrow roads.It has a very small park which has no swings or slides but just grass.Trelights is on the North Cornwall coast but is not by the sea. It is about 2 miles from the sea. There are 65 houses and 9 of these are holiday homes,which are empty most of the year.Access to Trelights is only by car, as we are 7 miles from the nearest town. We have one shop which sells groceries and its the Post Office. Theres a hotel with a public bar which is also only open in the Summer Season.
